OUTLINE : This multicenter study . All patient undergo full thickness disc excision . Patients T3 disease positive surgical margin surgery remove study . Patients T1 disease negative surgical margin surgery observe . Patients T2 disease negative surgical margin surgery receive adjuvant therapy . Beginning 42 day surgery , T2 patient receive leucovorin calcium ( CF ) IV 2 hour fluorouracil ( 5-FU ) IV bolus 1 hour infusion weekly 6 week . Beginning 2 week completion chemotherapy , patient receive chemoradiotherapy comprise radiotherapy daily 5 time week 5 week 5-FU IV continuously receive radiotherapy . Beginning 2 week completion chemoradiotherapy , patient receive CF IV 2 hour 5-FU IV bolus 1 hour infusion weekly 6 week . Chemotherapy repeat 2 week rest total 2 course . Patients follow every 3 month 2 year every 6 month 5 year .
